title: Glory in the Daytime diction in first paragraph

content.question: In the first paragraph, the narrator’s choice of conceptually related words such as “devout,” “worshiping,” and “altars” draws attention to which aspect of Mrs. Murdock’s character?

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
